topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538d25406368727792760200#post_538d25406368727792760200
Actually its more that everything belongs to the government. The thesis behind communism, Marxism, is that private property is in and of itself immoral and perpetuates and endless cycle of class struggle and oppression. Therefor, according to Marx, the only way to end the cycle is to abolish private property and have the government distribute the wealth to where it is needed. 

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538d23d663687276f24c0200#post_538d23d663687276f24c0200
I don't buy it. Replace "stabbed her friend" with "wrecked the family car" and it seems like you just have someone doing something bad and trying to get out of it by claiming an outside influence is responsible.
